'''Baizhu''' {{Lang|zh=白术|zh_rm=Báizhú}} is an upcoming playable [[Dendro]] [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

He is the owner of [[Bubu Pharmacy]] in [[Liyue Harbor]] and [[Qiqi]]'s guardian. He has a talking pet, [[Changsheng]], who is the white snake resting on his shoulders.
